banner.title: Quesearch
banner.description: An innovative platform for creating quizzes, surveys, and research tools to enhance employee engagement and organizational growth.
banner.slider: Analyze, Discover, Learn, Assess, Engage, Measure, Improve

intro.title: Discover the Features of
intro.description: Quesearch combines interactive quizzes and anonymous surveys to engage teams, assess progress, and make informed decisions.

quizzesBox.title: Quizzes
quizzesBox.description: Create interactive quizzes, divide users into teams, track progress, and compare results between users and teams.

surveysBox.title: Surveys
surveysBox.description: Design anonymous surveys to gather insights, assess situations, and support decision-making with data.

list.title: Admin
list.text: Admins can create and manage quizzes, surveys, teams, and user data. They have full access to user responses and can monitor results.

list.title: Player
list.text: Players can track their progress, view their answer history, and engage with materials prepared by admins.
